    • Thank you to our Supporters!!

    Deliverables Reminder!

    Prior to the first presentation, all teams must submit the below deliverables. Teams that do not will receive an automatic 20pt deduction from their over all score during judging. You can find some example final presentation Github repositories and projects at HackHPC.org The full schedule for the event can be viewed here.

    Due Monday 11/7/22 by 6:00p(EST)/5:00p(CT)/3:00p(PT)
    NOTE: If not posted by due date and time 20pt automatic deduction from final judging score.

    Deliverables Check List:

    • Github Repository Link Posted to the HackHPC Discord "#general" Channel
    • Source code Including Comments
    • README.md with a project description
    • PDF of presentation
      • Team members including mentors with pictures
      • Use of HPC technology in the project
      • Community impact of the project

    About

    Bring your energy and enthusiasm to this years hackthon. Leave with technical excellence, enabled by Omnibond and the NSF-funded Science Gateways Community Institute (SGCI) along with partners such as Intel HPC, ORNL, Voltron Data, Google Cloud, TACC, and Globus. We have joined forces in creating a diverse new generation of HPC data scientists and programmers.

    Social Links

    HackHPC.org twitter youtube linkedin
